about_the_game:
Train your brain with puzzles old and new. Can you solve them all?

It's almost like a series of mini escape rooms. Puzzillion is 3D first person game with lots of kinds of puzzles. Move things around (or throw them around), toggle switches, open doors, blend colors, rotate mirrors, attach wires - in short, train your brain solving challenge after challenge.

Includes puzzles of old (think "Towers of Hanoi", or "Wolf, Goat, and Cabbage") as well as new ones, with twists and surprises. Blend physics with logic, use simple machines, electricity, light and mirrors, cannons and cannonballs - jump in and train your brain with Puzzillion - a gazillion puzzles!
